japanese:
（ふう……。
　テストの結果は上々だったな）
translation:
(Phew...
 Everyone did well on their tests.)

japanese:
（一番の問題だった四葉も伸びてきている。
　とはいえ、相変わらずケアレスミスが多いのは
　もう性格だろうな……）
translation:
(Yotsuba, who was the most challenging to mentor,
 is improving. Although, making careless mistakes
 might just be part of her personality...)

japanese:
（俺もあいつらも、ここからが正念場。
　そして、この夏が１つの山場だ！）
translation:
(All of us are at a turning point now.
 And this summer is going to be a big one!)

japanese:
あれれ？
上杉さん、まだ起きてたんですか？
translation:
Ohhh?
Were you still up, Uesugi-san?

japanese:
ん？　なんだ四葉か。
お前こそ、まだ起きてたのか？
translation:
Hm? Oh, it's you, Yotsuba.
You're still up, too?

japanese:
こんな夜中に、こっそり１人で
何をしてたんですか？
むむむ～、これは怪しいですね！
translation:
What were you doing alone at this time of night?
Mmmmm, quite suspicious!

japanese:
怪しいとはなんだ。
お前たちのテスト結果を見て、
今後必要になりそうな問題集を作ってたんだ。
translation:
What's suspicious about it? I'm putting together
practice tests that seem likely to be needed
in the future, by looking at your test results.

japanese:
それぞれ見えてきた弱点部分を
この問題集で補えれば、もっと上を目指せるぞ。
translation:
If you make up for your weak areas
that have become visible with these practice tests,
you can aim even higher.

japanese:
も、問題集……。
テストが終わったばかりなのに、もうですか？
translation:
N-new practice tests...
Already? Just after our tests?

japanese:
こういうのは早めがいいんだよ。
手応えを覚えているうちに作っておかないと、
忘れちまう。
translation:
It's better to do it early.
If you don't study while it's still fresh,
you'll forget.

japanese:
でも、ダメですよ！
明日からはみんなで想い出作りなんですから、
しっかり休んでおかないと。
translation:
But, we can't! Starting tomorrow,
we're going to make memories together,
so we need to rest properly.

japanese: なので、今日はもう問題集作り禁止です！
translation: So, no more practice tests today!

japanese:
いや、今いいとこなんだよ。
もう少しだけ……。
translation:
No, this is a good time.
Just a little more...

japanese:
ぬぬぬぬ……。
どうしてもやると言うなら――
translation:
Grrr...
If you're gonna insist like this%p-2;――

japanese: ――えい！　これは没収です！
translation: %p-2;――%p; Hyah! This is confiscated!

japanese: （あっ、こいつ問題集を！）
translation: (Ah, she got the practice tests!)

japanese:
ふっふっふ。
これを返してほしければ、
今日はもうお休みしてください。
translation:
Teehee.
If you want these back,
take the rest of the day off, please.

japanese:
わかったよ。
今日はやめとくから、さっさと返してくれ。
translation:
Fine.
I'll call it quits for today,
so give them back.

japanese:
ホントですよね？
返した途端に、ふはははだまされたなー！
とか言いだしたりしませんよね？
translation:
Really?
You won't say 'Hahahaha, I fooled you!'
as soon as I give them back, right?

japanese:
言わねぇよ！
なんでそこで疑ってくるんだよ。
translation:
I won't say it!
Why do you have to doubt me there?

japanese: だって上杉さんですからねー。
translation: I mean, you ARE Uesugi-san.

japanese: はあ……。
translation: *sigh*

japanese:
それで？　お前はなにしてんだ？
いつもならもう寝てる時間だろ。
translation:
So, what are you doing?
You're usually asleep at this time.

japanese:
ああ、私はですね、
明日に備えて、何か遊びに使えるものが
ないかと探してるところです。
translation:
Oh, I'm searching for something fun to do,
in preparation for tomorrow.

japanese:
みんな色々と大変でしたし、
最後はパーッと楽しんでもらいたいじゃないですか！
translation:
Everyone had a hard time with this and that,
so in the end,
I want them to have a blast and enjoy themselves!

japanese:
明日は、みんなが素敵な想い出を作れるように
私、頑張っちゃいますよ！
translation:
Tomorrow, I'll do my best
so that everyone can create wonderful memories!

japanese: なるほどな、お前らしいな。
translation: I see, that's just like you.

japanese:
えへへ……。
今のうちに準備をしておけば、その分、
明日遊べる時間が増えますからね。
translation:
Hehe...
If we prepare now,
we'll have more time to play tomorrow, right?

japanese: 確かに一理あるな。
translation: That makes sense.

japanese:
上杉さんも、明日を楽しみにしててくださいね。
では、私は倉庫に……。
translation:
Uesugi-san, you'd best look forward to tomorrow too.
Well then, I'll head to storage...

japanese: よし、四葉、俺も手伝おう！
translation: Hey, Yotsuba, I'll help too!

japanese: ええっ！？
translation: Huh?!

japanese:
そんな、いいですよ。
疲れている上杉さんのお手を煩わせるわけに
いきません！
translation:
No, it's okay.
I can't bother you, Uesugi-san. You've got to be tired!

japanese: 疲れてるのはお前も一緒だろ。
translation: But you're tired too, aren't you?

japanese:
それに、想い出作りは俺たちみんなでするもんだ。
その準備をお前にだけ任せるのはおかしい。
translation:
Besides, making memories
is something we all do together.
It's weird to leave all the preparations to you.

japanese: それは……。
translation: Well...

japanese:
さあ、とっとと始めるぞ。
あの倉庫は色々と物が詰め込まれてるから
時間がかかりそうだ。
translation:
Come on, let's get started.
Since storage is packed with lots of stuff,
it might take some time.

japanese:
あー！　いえー！
大丈夫ですから、先に休んでてください！
translation:
Ah! No, no!
I'm fine by myself, so please get some rest!

japanese: はあ？　どうして。
translation: Huh? Why?

japanese:
どうしてもです！
じゃあ、ちょっと行ってきますね！
translation:
Just go rest!
Alright, I'll be back soon!

japanese: ――あっ、おい！？

（もう行っちまった……。
　相変わらず慌ただしいやつだな）
translation:
(She's already gone... 
 That girl is always so active.)

japanese:
（しかし、本当に１人で大丈夫なのか？
　よくわからん荷物をいじって壊しでもしたら――）
translation:
(But, can she really handle it alone?
 If she messes around with things she doesn't understand
 and breaks something.)

japanese: うひゃぁーーっ！？
translation: WAAH?!

japanese: （――って、さっそくか！！）
translation: (%p-2;――%p; Not ALREADY?!)

japanese:
あいててて……。
あ～、荷物、崩しちゃった……。
translation:
Ow...
Oh no! Everything fell over...

japanese: おい、四葉！
translation: Hey, Yotsuba!

japanese: あれ、上杉さん？
translation: Huh? Uesugi-san?

japanese: 大丈夫か！？　怪我はないか？
translation: Are you okay?! Did you get hurt?

japanese:
えっ？
あ、はい、大丈夫……みたいです。
translation:
Huh?
Oh, yes, I'm okay...I think.

japanese:
だったらいいが……。
って、ずいぶんと派手にひっくり返したな。
translation:
Well, that's good, then...
That was an impressive fall!

japanese:
戸棚の上の箱を取ろうとしたら
手元が滑っちゃいまして。
translation:
I was trying to get a box from the top of the cupboard
and my hands slipped.

japanese:
危険な物が置いてなくてよかったな。
ほら、手を貸してやるから……立てそうか？
translation:
It's a good thing there wasn't anything dangerous
in there. Here, let me help you up...
Can you stand?

japanese: ありがとうございます。
translation: Thank you.

japanese:
おい、本当に大丈夫なんだろうな。
痛むところがあったら言えよ？
translation:
Hey, I hope you're really okay.
If you're hurt, let me know, okay?

japanese:
そうですねー、上杉さんが親切すぎて
何か裏があるんじゃないかって心配になっています。
translation:
Well, you're so kind... It makes me worry
that you're hiding something.

japanese:
そういう意味では、
ちょっと頭痛がするかもしれません。
translation:
If you see it this way,
it might give me a bit of a headache.

japanese: またそんなことを……俺は真面目に聞いてるんだぞ？
translation:
That again...
I'm being serious, you know?

japanese:
ごめんなさい。
大丈夫です、痛いところは本当にありません。
translation:
Sorry.
I'm okay. I'm really not hurt.

japanese:
まったく、もう少し注意しろよ。
怪我なんてしたら、お前が楽しめなくなるんだからな。
translation:
Seriously, be more careful.
If you get hurt,
you won't be able to enjoy yourself, you know.

japanese: えへへ、それもそうですね。
translation: Teehee, you're right about that.

japanese: 笑うとこじゃないだろ。
translation: That's nothing to laugh at.

japanese:
だって、駆けつけてくれたときの上杉さん、
ちょっと格好よかったので……
思い出すとニコニコしちゃいます。
translation:
But, when you came to help me, Uesugi-san,
you looked kinda cool... Remembering it
is making me smile.

japanese: 格好いいって……。
translation: I looked cool, eh...

japanese:
ビックリしちゃいましたよ。
転んだ途端に駆けつけてくれるなんて、
まるでヒーローみたいでした。
translation:
I was so surprised! Just as I fell,
you came rushing over like a hero.
It was like something out of a movie.

japanese:
急になに言い出すんだよ。
あれくらい……普通だろ？
translation:
What are you talking about all of a sudden?
It's not...that big a deal, is it?

japanese: おやおやぁ、照れましたね？
translation: Oh, you're embarrassed, aren't you?

japanese: ったく、照れてねーよ。
translation: C'mon, I'm not embarrassed.

japanese:
まあ、いい。
それより、倉庫を散らかしたままじゃまずいな。
確かこの前、五月たちが整理してたはずだし。
translation:
Well, whatever. More importantly, we shouldn't
leave the storage room this messy. I'm pretty sure
Itsuki and the others organized it recently.

japanese:
はっ！？
せっかく綺麗に片付けてあったのに！
translation:
WHA?!
Oh no! It had just been cleaned up, too!

japanese:
ちゃんと反省してるか？
頼むから余計な心配をさせないでくれ。
translation:
Are you really reflecting on what you did?
Please don't make me worry needlessly.

japanese:
すみません。
しっかり反省してますので大丈夫です！
translation:
I'm sorry.
I'm really thinking about it!

japanese: ……本当だろうな？
translation: ...Really?

japanese: もちろんです！
translation: Of course!

japanese:
（笑顔でそう言われてもなぁ。
　まあ、こいつは素直だからしていると信じよう）
translation:
(She's saying that with a smile on her face...
 But I'll trust her since she's honest.)

japanese:
まあ、いい。
それより、倉庫を散らかしたままじゃまずいな。
確かこの前、五月たちが整理してたはずだし。
translation:
Well, whatever. More importantly, we shouldn't
leave the storage room this messy. I'm pretty sure
Itsuki and the others organized it recently.

japanese:
はっ！？
せっかく綺麗に片付けてあったのに！
translation:
WHA?!
Oh no! It had just been cleaned up, too!

japanese:
俺がいてよかったな。
１人なら大変だっただろ。
translation:
I'm glad I was there for you.
What would you have done by yourself?

japanese:
上杉さんは、大事なときに必ず来てくれます。
ホントに……なんででしょうか。
translation:
You always come through for me when it counts,
Uesugi-san.
Why...is that?

japanese:
今回はたまたまだ。
まあ、なんとなく、危なっかしいとは思ってたがな。
translation:
It was just a coincidence this time.
Although,
I did have a feeling that something might happen.

japanese:
心配してくれてたんですね。
ありがとうございます。
translation:
You were worried about me?
Thank you so much.

japanese:
お前は後先考えず行動するところがあるからな。
なんか、ほっとけねぇんだよ。
translation:
Well, you have a tendency to act
without thinking things through.
I just can't just leave you alone.

japanese: ……えへへ、お手数かけます。
translation: ...Hehe, sorry about that.

japanese:
まあ、いい。
それより、倉庫を散らかしたままじゃまずいな。
確かこの前、五月たちが整理してたはずだし。
translation:
Well, whatever. More importantly, we shouldn't
leave the storage room this messy. I'm pretty sure
Itsuki and the others organized it recently.

japanese:
はっ！？
せっかく綺麗に片付けてあったのに！
translation:
WHA?!
Oh no! It had just been cleaned up, too!

japanese: うぅ、私はまたみんなに迷惑を……。
translation: Oooh, I've caused trouble for everyone again...

japanese:
あまり気にするな。
お前だって、みんなのためにと思って
やってたんだろ？
translation:
Don't worry about it.
You were doing it for everyone's sake, weren't you?

japanese: それはそうですけど……。
translation: That's true, but...

japanese:
ほら、さっさと片付けちまうぞ。
俺も手伝う。
translation:
Come on, let's clean it up quickly.
I'll help.

japanese:
いえいえ！
散らかしたのは私なんですから、
上杉さんに手伝ってもらうなんて、とんでもない！
translation:
No, no!
I made the mess, so there's no way
I'm going to ask you to help me, Uesugi-san.

japanese:
だからって見て見ぬ振りなんて
できるわけないだろ。
translation: But I can't just turn a blind eye to it, can I?

japanese: 上杉さん……。
translation: Uesugi-san...

japanese:
よーし！
では、元よりもっと綺麗に
整理整頓しちゃいましょう！
translation:
Alrighty!
Let's make it even cleaner than before!

japanese:
そこまでやらなくてもいいと思うが……。
ほら、行くぞ。
translation:
I don't think we need to go that far...
But alright, let's do it!

japanese: はーい！
translation: Okaaay!
